privacy.title: Privacy Policy - HI-MAN
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how HI-MAN ("we") uses information when you interact with our Instagram Business account @himanistanbul and our internal tools. The application is used only to manage our own business messages and content; it is not a public service.
privacy.item_messages: Instagram Direct Messages sent to/received from @himanistanbul (message content and metadata such as sender ID and timestamps).
privacy.item_logs: Operational logs for delivery and troubleshooting.
privacy.use_support: Receive, store and manage messages for customer support and order communications.
privacy.use_improve: Improve internal processes and ensure service reliability and security.
privacy.sharing_text: We do not sell or share data with third parties for marketing. Our infrastructure providers (hosting, storage) may process data solely to operate the service.
privacy.retention_text: Message data is retained as long as necessary for operations and record-keeping, then deleted or anonymized.
privacy.security_text: Access to data is limited to authorized personnel. Transport uses HTTPS; webhook events are verified with HMAC signatures. Data is stored in access-controlled databases.
privacy.choices_text: Instagram users may delete messages on their side or request deletion of data under our control. See the Data Deletion section for instructions.

terms.title: Terms of Use - HI-MAN
terms.heading: Terms of Use
terms.intro: These Terms govern internal use of HI-MAN tools, including the Instagram Business integration for the @himanistanbul account. The application is an internal tool and not a public service.
terms.accept_item1: Use is limited to legitimate business purposes by authorized HI-MAN personnel.
terms.accept_item2: Users must comply with applicable laws and Meta/Instagram policies.
terms.accept_item3: Misuse, disruption, or attempts at reverse engineering are prohibited.
terms.data_text: We process Instagram messages and related metadata to support customers and operations. See our Privacy Policy for details.
terms.availability_text: We strive for high availability but do not guarantee it; outages or maintenance may occur.
terms.liability_text: To the extent permitted by law, the service is provided “as is” without warranties.
terms.changes_text: We may update these Terms. Continued internal use constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

data_deletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions - HI-MAN
data_deletion.heading: Data Deletion Instructions
data_deletion.instructions_html: If you have exchanged messages with @himanistanbul on Instagram and want your message data removed from our systems, email privacy@himan.com.tr with the subject “Instagram Data Deletion Request”. Include your Instagram username and approximate conversation date. After verifying ownership, we will delete data under our control subject to legal retention requirements.
data_deletion.direct_delete: You can delete messages directly in Instagram; however, server-side copies required for business records may be retained until the above request process is completed.
